name: Ro Tries Tracking
description:
Ro Panuganti and DJ Steamy Pete set out to make a music track and game in GB studio within an hour and without any previous knowledge using the software . This will be the first of multiple in this series where we have a musician make a track in GB studio.

Each track is separated into it's own channel which can be accessed by clicking on the icon. The top is Duty 1 and Duty 2 while the bottom is Wave and Noise. 

The middle icon plays the whole track.

The tip middle icon gives a tutorial and some q and a with Ro and Peter.

If you want to see more projects like this check out our IndieGoGo: https://igg.me/at/ggstudio/x/28894107#/
